component.name: PokeMMO
component.summary: PokeMMO is a free to play mmorpg, come join a growing community as you level up and discover new monsters

description.p: PokeMMO is an online-only emulator for several popular Nintendo DS & Game Boy Advance games, allowing you to play, talk, fight, and trade with other players in real time. PokeMMO also supports Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS, with tens of thousands of players online daily in a cross-play environment
PokeMMO requires certain third-party ROM files to play.
This game requires a constant internet connection. Usage of this program requires an account and requires you to accept the PokeMMO Terms of Service at login
This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by the PokeMMO Team.
